heading: Plucked instrument quartets.
general-note: Here are entered collections of quartets not in a specific form or of a specific type for various combinations of four plucked stringed instruments. Individual plucked instrument quartets and collections not in a specific form or of a specific type for a single combination of instruments are entered under this heading followed by the instruments in alphabetical order..
Collections of compositions for four plucked keyboard instruments are entered under. Keyboard instrument ensembles, Harpsichord ensembles, and similar headings..
